body_html:
I'm using an amazon g2.2 instance with GRID K520. CUDA 8.061. Building from source works, however I still encounter issue #967, so I thought I may as well test the docker images. However these both error, as above ^.

I have been trying for days to find a fix to slow dilated Conv1d (#967), because I need to train a model on GPU. But despite many clean installs and different versions of pytorch I have had no luck. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

body:
I'm using an amazon g2.2 instance with GRID K520. CUDA 8.061. Building from source works, however I still encounter issue #967, so I thought I may as well test the docker images. However these both error, as above ^.

I have been trying for days to find a fix to slow dilated Conv1d (#967), because I need to train a model on GPU. But despite many clean installs and different versions of pytorch I have had no luck. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
